text: At last, atomic energy has been released and destroyed all human life on the planet. Only one resident has escaped from a Chicago skyscraper. After eating and drinking everything he had in his fridge, reading, seeing, looking and hearing his ideal library, his imaginary museum and his royal disco, desperate to see that he was not dying, he decides to suppress himself and jumps to the void from the fortyth floor. Just as he walks through the first floor apartment, he hears the phone ringing. Finish Philosophical Tales, 1971
title: Las voces del silencio
author: Costas Axelos
